title: Just got Rek'Sai, tips/tricks plzzzzzz
body:
I finally reached 6300IP again and bought Rek'Sai since I remember her as a fun jungler to play and I'm getting bored of Lee Sin now...

Tips?
Builds?
Tricks?

{{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}}

replies.body:
http://www.probuilds.net/
http://www.probuilds.net/champions/RekSai

These can be very helpful~
T U N N E L S B O Y S

> [{quoted}](name=MageBlades,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5qF3Twrn,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-14T04:31:17.173+0000)
>
> I'm assuming Devourers is really good on her right?
> I reckon Skirmish's Blade should be good on her...???
> 
> {{champion:421}}

I go warrior into triforce then full tank works well others do hydra full tank so its up to you also aa before you q as its an aa reset
Rush Hydra, then whatever you want as you'll dominate as she's broken.
